item.title: Basics
item.description: Arrr Fello' pirrates, be awarrre some featurrres may not work fer us in this trrranslat'n. Like table of rrramblings and stuff. Chapter 1 Basics Discover what this Cap'n Hugo theme be all about an' th' core-concepts behind it.

item.title: Rambl'n
item.description: Arrr Fello' pirrates, be awarrre some featurrres may not work fer us in this trrranslat'n. Like table of rrramblings and stuff. Chapter 2 Rrrambl'n Find out how t' create an' org'nize yer rrrambl'n quickly an' intuitively.

item.title: Shorrrtcodes
item.description: Arrr Fello' pirrates, be awarrre some featurrres may not work fer us in this trrranslat'n. Like table of rrramblings and stuff. Chapter 3 Shorrrtcodes Cap'n Hugo uses Marrrkdown fer its simple rrrambl'n format. However, there be a lot o' th'ns that Marrrkdown doesnâ€™t support well. Ye could use pure HTML t' expand possibilities. But this happens t' be a bad idea. Everyone uses Marrrkdown because it’s pure an' simple t' read even non-rendered.

item.title: This could be yers
